properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 1:25PM PST until February 6 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 10 to 13 ft at 12 seconds through tonight. Seas
diminish briefly, then build to 11 to 13 feet at 16 seconds
Tuesday night.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...The current Small Craft Advisory is in effect until 4 AM
PST Tuesday. The next Small Craft Advisory is in effect from 10
PM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas could capsize or
damage smaller vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY
